text:
ow many people are affected by Kidney Dysplasia ?,"Kidney dysplasia is a common condition. Scientists estimate that kidney dysplasia affects about one in 4,000 babies.1 This estimate may be low because some people with kidney dysplasia are never diagnosed with the condition. About half of the babies diagnosed with this condition have other urinary tract defects.2",NIDDK,Kidney Dysplasia
What are the symptoms of Kidney Dysplasia ?,"Many babies with kidney dysplasia in only one kidney have no sign
